name: @alextheman/components
description: A package containing common React components used across my projects.
author: alextheman

scripts.create-local-package: pnpm run build && rm -f alextheman-components-*.tgz && pnpm pack
scripts.create-release-note: git pull origin main && bash -c 'alex-c-line create-release-note-2 $@' --
scripts.format: pnpm run format-prettier && pnpm run format-eslint
scripts.format-prettier: pnpm run format-prettier-typescript && pnpm run format-prettier-javascript && pnpm run format-prettier-yml
scripts.lint: pnpm run lint-tsc && pnpm run lint-eslint && pnpm run lint-prettier
scripts.lint-prettier: pnpm run lint-prettier-typescript && pnpm run lint-prettier-javascript && pnpm run lint-prettier-yml
scripts.prepare-local-eslint-plugin: dotenv -e .env -- sh -c 'ESLINT_PLUGIN_PATH=${LOCAL_ESLINT_PLUGIN_PATH:-../eslint-plugin}; pnpm --prefix "$ESLINT_PLUGIN_PATH" run build && pnpm uninstall @alextheman/eslint-plugin && pnpm install --save-dev file:"$ESLINT_PLUGIN_PATH"'
scripts.prepare-local-utility: dotenv -e .env -- sh -c 'UTILITY_PATH=${LOCAL_UTILITY_PATH:-../utility}; pnpm --prefix "$UTILITY_PATH" run build && pnpm uninstall @alextheman/utility && pnpm install file:"$UTILITY_PATH"'
scripts.use-live-eslint-plugin: pnpm run prepare-live-eslint-plugin && pnpm run lint
scripts.use-local-eslint-plugin: pnpm run prepare-local-eslint-plugin && pnpm run lint
scripts.test-update-ci-snapshots: docker run --rm -it -v "$PWD":/work -v "$HOME/.pnpm-store":/pnpm-store -w /work mcr.microsoft.com/playwright:v1.58.2-jammy bash -lc "npm i -g pnpm@10.29.3 && pnpm config set store-dir /pnpm-store && pnpm install && pnpm test-update-snapshots"
